title: SBF Trial – Week 4 concludes with SBF telling jury he was blindsided by $8B shortfall
description:
Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) took the stand again on Oct. 27 — this time in front of a jury — and told the courtroom that he had been blindsided by the $8 billion shortfall that led to FTX and Alameda Research’s collapse. The former billionaire testified and went through a thorough cross-examination on Oct. 26 without […]

The post SBF Trial – Week 4 concludes with SBF telling jury he was blindsided by $8B shortfall appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried takes the stand: Recap of trial day 14
description: Former FTX CEO and Founder Bankman-Friend takes the stand today, blaming Caroline Ellison for poor management in Alameda and admitting to political donations from customer funds.
